Heirloom


A fun, fresh and economic take on chocolate branding. Originally designing within pure CMYK constraints to aid the cost-efficiency and print-efficiency of the paper choccy milk labels, magenta, blue and black went on to colour code the different types of organic chocolate used in the Heirloom family. With matching patterns to boot. Branding, Packaging, Logotype
